website_summaries.verdict: The combination of satisfying combat, excellent story, and open-world exploration makes The Witcher 3 the best in the series, and one of the best games released this year.
pros: Well-crafted world and lore, with engaging dialogue and overarching story arcs
cons: Nvidia HairWorks technology ruins frame rate

customer_reviews.title: It is one of the best RPGs I have played in years
customer_reviews.text: While I purchased the first two Witcher games I struggled to get into them, not so with this game. It is one of the best RPGs I have played in years, the story is immersive and the action well balanced within it. I haven't played too much of the additional content yet, concentrating more on the main story however I feel the longevity will keep me coming back for a while, this is only compounded by the fact it has free DLC added regularly which is adding considerably to the available content. Definitely one of the contenders for game of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Dendanier

customer_reviews.title: Love this game.
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. It's another in the class of Skyrim.. however personally I preferred Skyrim. That's not meant to discredit this game, the story is very compelling and you do get a feel for the game and the world behind Geralt (The main man). Hunting monsters and doing bidding for kings and queens is the bread and butter of this game. The quests vary in content and requirements and the game constantly has a fresh feel. I started over once because I upgraded in a skill class which I thought later on in the game may not have been so useful, all part of the learning :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible game - every aspect is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Incredible game - every aspect is perfect. Beautiful graphics, great story line mixed with ad hoc quests. The fighting is realistic and superbly done. It has an embedded card game called 'Gwent' (I have never been in to cards but have become addicted). I love this game it is just plain superb and the best out there in my opinion. This and GTA V have kept me totally engrossed for many days/weeks. It has the same long update downloads that all games seem to have these days. Well worth putting up with that. Delivery and packaging was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dionysuss

customer_reviews.title: The best just got better
customer_reviews.text: The best just got better! What can I say? Quite simply, the best game I have ever seen. Similarities come to mind with Skyrim and if you like that game you will love Witcher. It has a totally immersive world with a wonderfully complex story line. Witcher is more adult than Skyrim so be warned. It is also more complex in terms of interface and also the shear magnitude of interactive items and characters. It is HUGE!! Be prepared to loose many, many hours playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: steveyorkkei

customer_reviews.title: A beautifully crafted work of art
customer_reviews.text: A beautifully crafted work of art. Here are the things that are wrong with it: 1. Can't re-map the controller layout. 2. Swimming mechanics are terrible. 3. The main character and a lot of NPCs are seriously ugly. Having three fairly minor complaints (and the latter only arising as a consequence of the game being so beautifully rendered) perhaps illustrates how incredible this game is.
